name: DefCom TD
description:
DefCom TD is a simple survival game with tower defense and real-time strategy elements. Action is going on a randomly generated map, where player should build his base, gather resources and defend from endless waves of enemies.

Features:
• Original mix of TD and RTS
• Enemies vary from infantry to aviation
• Randomly generated map
• Pleasant 3D graphics and sound
• Simple and intuitive controls
• No Ads or In-App Purchases

Good luck and have fun!
